c-ordinary-22.entranceAntiphon: Have mercy on me, O Lord, for I cry to you all the day long. O Lord, you are good and forgiving, full of mercy to all who call to you.
c-ordinary-22.responsorialPsalm: In your goodness, O God, you provided a home for the poor.
c-ordinary-22.gospelAcclamation: Alleluia, alleluia. Take my yoke upon you, says the Lord, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart. Alleluia.
c-ordinary-22.communionAntiphon: How great is the goodness, Lord, that you keep for those who fear you.

c-ordinary-23.entranceAntiphon: You are just, O Lord, and your judgement is right; treat your servant in accord with your merciful love.
c-ordinary-23.responsorialPsalm: Lord, you have been our refuge, from generation to generation.
c-ordinary-23.gospelAcclamation: Alleluia, alleluia. Let your face shine forth on your servant, and teach me your decrees. Alleluia.
c-ordinary-23.communionAntiphon: Like the deer that yearns for running streams, so my soul is yearning for you, my God; my soul is thirsting for God, the living God.

the-exaltation-of-the-holy-cross.entranceAntiphon: We should glory in the Cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, in whom is our salvation, life and resurrection, through whom we are saved and delivered.
the-exaltation-of-the-holy-cross.responsorialPsalm: Never forget the deeds of the Lord!
the-exaltation-of-the-holy-cross.gospelAcclamation: Alleluia, alleluia. We adore you, O Christ, and we bless you, because by your Cross you have redeemed the world. Alleluia.
the-exaltation-of-the-holy-cross.communionAntiphon: When I am lifted up from the earth, I will draw everyone to myself, says the Lord.

c-ordinary-25.entranceAntiphon: I am the salvation of the people, says the Lord.  Should they cry to me in any distress, I will hear them, and I will be their Lord for ever.
c-ordinary-25.responsorialPsalm: Praise the LORD, who raises the poor.
c-ordinary-25.gospelAcclamation: Alleluia, alleluia. Jesus Christ, though he was rich, yet for your sake he became poor, so that you by his poverty might become rich. Alleluia.
c-ordinary-25.communionAntiphon: You have laid down your precepts to be carefully kept; may my ways be firm in keeping your statutes.
